video_prompt: **Prompt:** Young woman slowly raises hand to chin, fingers gently caressing her cheek. Her expression subtly shifts from neutral to contemplative, a hint of shyness. Her lavender ponytail gently sways with the movement. Fabric textures subtly ripple as she moves. Background lighting softly changes, enhancing the mood.
image_prompt: Digital oil painting: Young woman with fair skin, blush, muted red lips, large blue eyes, dark lashes/brows. Long lavender hair in high ponytail. Wearing cropped periwinkle-lavender crew neck sweater and light blue jeans. Two silver chain necklaces (choker, long with bell pendant) and silver hoop earrings. Right hand gently touching face below chin. Textured abstract light blue, white, and gray background. Cool dominant palette (blue, lavender, gray). Visible brushstrokes throughout.
refined_video_prompt: A hand slowly rises to the chin, fingers gently caressing the cheek. The expression subtly shifts from neutral to contemplative, hinting at shyness. Hair gently sways with subtle head movements. Fabric ripples subtly with each motion. Background lighting softly transitions.
